title: CA to address nation on Victory Day Tuesday evening
body: State-owned Bangladesh Television (BTV), BTV News and Bangladesh Betar will simultaneously broadcast the speech, said the Chief Adviser's Press Wing this afternoon On the occasion of the Great Victory Day, Chief Adviser Professor Muhammad Yunus will address the nation at 6pm on Tuesday. State-owned Bangladesh Television (BTV), BTV News and Bangladesh Betar will simultaneously broadcast the speech, said the Chief Adviser's Press Wing this afternoon.
